articles.author: Ryan Gilliam
articles.title: Monster Hunter Rise’s April update adds elder dragons on April 27 - Polygon
articles.description: Monster Hunter Rise’s version 2.0 update is available April 27. The new additions include two elder dragons, Chameleos, and an uncapped Hunter Rank. Capcom also revealed an upcoming roadmap, including details about Monster Hunter’s end-of-May update.
articles.content: Its time to uncap your Hunter Rank

articles.title: Razer’s Orochi V2 wireless gaming mouse has long battery life - The Verge
articles.description: Razer has released a new compact wireless gaming mouse called the Orochi V2. It features long battery life, Bluetooth and 2.4GHz wireless modes, and a design that should lend well to gamers, regardless of their grip style.
articles.content:
